page.syntax: HTML_Code as C = a5w_info([L full_page [,L include_prodheader ]])

argument.name: HTML_Code
argument.description: Information about Application Server settings and variables.

argument.name: full_page
argument.description:
Optional. Default = .T.
.T. = Return a complete HTML page.
.F. = Return only formatted table data to insert into another HTML page.

page.description: Create a web page with info about the A5W environment
page.discussion: The A5W_INFO() function displays a summary page showing all server settings and variables. This function only works on a page submitted to the Application Server. Limitations: Web publishing applications only.

section.description: These are several examples of how the function could be used in an A5W page.
section.example:
<%a5 a5w_info() %> ... <%a5 a5w_info(.f.) %> ... <%a5 ? a5w_info() %> ... <%a5 x = a5w_info() ? x %> ...

Below is the output from a5w_info()

<%a5 a5w_info(.f.) %>
